meanings.definition: Take part in an activity or event.
meanings.sent1: She participates in the school play every year.
meanings.sent2: He participates in the charity run to help raise money.
meanings.sent3: The cat participates in the game of chasing the laser pointer.
meanings.sent4: The sun participates in the dance of the planets around it.
meanings.sent5: The flower participates in the garden's beauty with its vibrant colors.

meanings.sent1: They participate in the decision-making process at work.
meanings.sent2: She participates in various community projects to give back.
meanings.sent3: The dog participates in the family picnic by stealing hot dogs.
meanings.sent4: The wind participates in shaping the sand dunes over time.
meanings.sent5: The music participates in creating a joyful atmosphere at the party.
